data.title: PROPOSAL
questions: In this phase, clarify the support being requested.
State the general request in the subject/heading.
Define the specific action, decision or resource needed.
ummarize your rationale. Why is it needed? Why now?

data.title: CONTEXT
questions: In this phase, connect the proposal to relevant contextual factors.
Show how this supports a corporate/unit strategy, priority, goal or value.
Link relevant external issues, trends and events to the request.
Identify potential future impacts: If approved, this will…
Identify negative consequences if action is not taken immediately.

data.title: SUPPORTING DATA
questions: In this phase, pull together all relevant data to make your case.
Provide accurate, specific data supporting your request.
Provide short- and long-term costs in sufficient detail.
Make explicit any implicit assumptions, risks or caveats.
Present data in objective, yet persuasive ways (e.g., use contrast).

data.title: BENEFITS
questions: In this phase, determine the people impacts of your proposal.
Who will be impacted? Who gains? Who loses? Who pays?
Which stakeholder(s) support this? Who is ‘on board’?
How will stakeholders/customers benefit from this action?
How will this help productivity, morale, competitiveness, etc.?

data.title: DECISION + ACTION
questions: In this phase, summarize the request for support in clear terms.
Restate the request calling for action: “Your approval is requested for…”
